props.block: Expands the button to 100% of available space.
props.flat: Removes the button box shadow. This is different than using the 'flat' variant.
props.icon: Apply a specific icon using the [v-icon](/components/icons/) component. The button will become _round_.
props.plain: Removes the default background change applied when hovering over the button.
props.readonly: Puts the button in a readonly state. Cannot be clicked or navigated to by keyboard.
props.stacked: Displays the button as a flex-column.

exposed.group: Internal representation when used in VBtnToggle.
